actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to modify certain administrative procedures in order to expedite proceedings of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Wholesale Electric Rate Fairness Act - Amends the Federal Power Act to authorize the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to: (1) delegate its authority to suspend the operation of any electric rate schedule; (2) waive the requirement that a person apply for a rehearing; and (3) promulgate rules for rehearings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to modify certain administrative procedures in order to expedite proceedings of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, and for other purposes.
